Future of Jobs Report 2025

The report presents information and data compiled by the World Economic Forum, covering the future of jobs in various fields. It highlights emerging trends, skills, and technologies that will shape the job market in 2025.

Key Concepts:

  • Job market trends
  • Global economic outlook
  • Sustainable development
  • gig economy
  • resilience skills
  • agility skills
  • leadership skills
  • structural change
